attributes.action: We ask that the knighthood of Sir Bernard Ingham be removed.
attributes.additional_details:
Articles from the Independent and Liverpool Echo regarding Sir Bernard Inghams conduct regarding this matter.

http://indy100.independent.co.uk/article/sir-bernard-ingham-the-disgraceful-letter-margaret-thatchers-aide-sent-to-hillsborough-campaigners--WkFP4C0obb

http://www.liverpoolecho.co.uk/news/liverpool-news/bernard-ingham-still-refuses-say-11244412
attributes.background: In light of the recent verdict of the Hillsborough disaster Inquest, determining that the 96 Liverpool fans who died as a result were unlawfully killed, Sir Bernard Inghams subsequent actions in vindicating the South Yorkshire Police putting the blame on those who died, their families and the fans.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
